version_description: DepthEffects includes a new Portrait2 lens with a very unique focus. This lens is sharp in the center with a swirly bokeh effect towards the edges. Great for portrait shots. This is based on the Petzval Lens which was designed in 1840 and one of the earli

PortraitCam AI - Convert any photo into a stunning Portrait Mode shot with AI. This new AI automatically detects people (and dogs and cats!) in your photos and applies a beautiful lens blur! Get the perfect blur with the builtin mask editor.

PortraitCam offers the absolute best lens blur. To get this blur, PortraitCam has mastered the art of computational photography.
